Stonkraft Designer Branded Shoulder Bag (Brown) Price: Rs.2995

This Shoulder Bag is indeed an extraordinary creation apt for everyday use. Made for the fashion savvy women of today this shoulder bag can be paired with any trendy and casual outfit to sport a stylish look. The exteriors of this bag are crafted in Faux leather and the interiors are made of Taffeta thereby offering a sturdy and secure support to all the essentials you require for the day. Built with capacious interiors this medium-sized Shoulder Bag has the capacity to accommodate your possessions without any hassle.
